text: A yi saraxane bama lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ alo Musa a yamari kii naxan yi a xa a liga waxatin birin, Matabu Lɔxɔne nun kike nɛnɛn sanle nun sali lɔxɔ saxanne ɲɛɛ yo ɲɛɛ, Buru Tetaren Sanla8.13 Buru Tetaren Sanla: Yahudiyane yi burun donma lɛbɛn mi yi saxi naxan yi xii solofere sanli ito bun. E sariɲan kiina nde nan yi a ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.15 kui. nun Xunsagine Sanla nun Bubu Kui Sanla.8.13 Bubu Kui Sanla fe sɛbɛxi Saraxaraline 23.33-38 kui.
